vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) prey, plunder, spoil, booty
1a) prey
1b) booty, spoil, plunder (of war)
1c) plunder (private)
1d) gain (meaning dubious)

1b) (戰爭)戰利品, 掠奪品

1d) 獲得
